Software Developer Position at Hala Systems (REMOTE, US-Based)

We are looking for a solid software engineer with experience developing single page, serverless web apps using Node. Our existing systems and current development uses AWS, so while not required, AWS experience is a big plus. This is a full-time remote position, with some limited travel. The candidate is expected to have previous remote experience or feel confident in their ability to supply the appropriate work environment, including a sufficient internet connection, appropriate workspace, and other typical remote/home office needs. We expect availability during most of the typical work day in US time zones. This is a contract-to-hire position. The start date is ASAP.
